article_title: Dance for Life holds showcase reveal
article_text:
Paxton Webster and Dan Chop perform at Dance for Life.

WILMINGTON, NC (WWAY) — Dance for Life held a showcase reveal Saturday night to offer a sneak peak of what the Diamonds & Champagne Hope Ball will offer in November.

On November 7th, couples will perform various styles of dance in a competition to raise money to benefit Women of Hope. Dancers will perform everything from waltzes to swing dancing.

Women of Hope is a charitable organization that supports women with cancer and their families.

Click here for more information about Women of Hope and the Dance for Life event.
